page.title: 03POPULATION KIBWORTH 1985
page.content: Kibworth Beauchamp and Kibworth Harcourt have a combined population of approximately 5000 inhabitants. The largest number live in Kibworth Beauchamp which has more recent housing developments than Kibworth Harcourt. A relatively small number find employment in the immediate locality _ the majority of people employed commute to Leicester or to its suburbs. Other centre of employment include Market Harborough and Corby. Housing in Kibworth Beauchamp is mixed with many new and old properties of varying price brackets. The majority are owner occupied, the only rented properties are in two very small council estates. This mixture of housing is reflected in the social make up of the population giving a wide variety of lifestyles.
